TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSchemaAll extends System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaGroupBase

Docs.summary: Represents the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) element (compositor).

remarks.format:
## Remarks The XmlSchemaAll class permits the elements in the group to appear (or not appear) in any order in the containing element.
## Examples The following example creates an `all` element.
[!code-cs[Classic WebData XmlSchemaAll Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.schema.xmls_32_1.cs)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlSchemaAll Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.schema.xmls_32_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlSchemaAll Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.xml.schema.xmls_32_1.cpp)]
